basics.name: Diego Solorzano
basics.label: Senior Front-end Developer
basics.summary: Senior Front-End Developer with over 8 years of experience engineering high-performance web applications using React.js, Node.js, and Python. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions for global enterprises, managing architectures for industry-leading websites. Expert in bridging UX/UI design with technical execution and recently spearheaded the deployment of proprietary AI engines. Dedicated to optimizing user experience, system performance, and CI/CD pipelines.

highlights: Direct front-end architecture and code standard definitions, fostering a culture of best practices and high-quality build processes.
Collaborate with Product Owners, Architects, and UX/UI designers to translate complex business requirements into scalable Front-End Architectures.
Spearhead technical research to identify and implement innovative solutions for complex business features.
Serve as the liaison between business group UX/UI teams and technical development teams to ensure design fidelity.
Optimize CI/CD pipelines to streamline Front-End implementation and deployment cycles.
Serve as the Subject Matter Expert (SME) providing mentorship and technical support to development teams.
Engineered a proprietary AI solution by fine-tuning Mistral-7B using QLoRA on consumer GPUs for CINVESTAV Training.
Architected a secure, zero-cost inference system, deploying the fine-tuned model via a FastAPI backend with strict output validation.
Managed the global corporate website for a leading microcontroller company, overseeing 15,000+ pages across four languages (En, Cn, Kr, Jp).
Achieved the #1 Industry Website ranking by Bowen Craggs (2022) through continuous performance and UX improvements.
Led the front-end development team in the creation of modular, reusable web components to modernize nxp.com.
Built a dynamic React.js application utilizing search engine APIs to display real-time, keyword-driven content.
Implemented responsive, adaptive UI layouts using Flexbox and modern CSS patterns to ensure cross-device compatibility.
Coordinated with UX, IT, and Business Analysts to enforce corporate standards regarding security, accessibility, and performance.
Oversaw the full lifecycle of web applications, from planning and development to testing and deployment.
Leveraged a modern tech stack including React, Node, TypeScript, and ES6 to build robust web solutions.
Championed Agile and Scrum methodologies, significantly reducing development lifecycles and improving delivery velocity.
Partnered with stakeholders to refine user interface requirements and translate concepts into technical specifications.
Engineered highly responsive UI components, ensuring seamless user interaction and visual consistency.
Analyzed and enhanced front-end performance, documenting optimizations and managing version updates.
Managed enterprise-level content delivery operations using OpenText CMS.
Executed the launch of high-priority product landing pages, ensuring timely market release.
Performed rigorous QA testing and validation to ensure zero-defect deployments.
Contributed to large-scale corporate initiatives, including the content migration from NXP to Qualcomm and microsite development.
Constructed compliant web pages adhering to established HTML architectural standards.
